metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35534 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In LibRaw, there is a memory corruption vulnerability within the"crxFreeSubbandData()" function (libraw\src\decoders\crx.cpp) whenprocessing cr3 files.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
